mapper.insert: insert into tbluser(usrNum, usrClassification, usrId, usrPwd, usrName, usrPhone, usrGender, usrBirth, usrJoinDate, usrType, usrState, usrLoginDate, usrImg, usrChangePwdDate) values(tbluser_seq.nextval, '회원', #{usrId}, #{usrPwd},#{usrName}, #{usrPhone}, #{usrGender}, #{usrBirth}, sysdate, '일반회원가입', '회원', sysdate, '이미지', sysdate)

insert into userdetail(usrNum, usrCity1, usrDistrict1, usrCity2, usrDistrict2, usrCategory1, usrCategory2) values(tbluser_seq.currval, #{usrCity1}, #{usrDistrict1}, #{usrCity2}, #{usrDistrict2}, #{usrCategory1}, #{usrCategory2})
insert into userterms(usrNum, usrTerm, usrPersonalTerm, usrEmailTerm) values(tbluser_seq.currval, #{usrTerm}, #{usrPersonalTerm}, #{usrEmailTerm})
insert into userhistory(usrHistoryNum, usrNum, usrName, usrState, usrStateUpdateDate) values(userhistory_seq.nextval, tbluser_seq.currval, #{usrName}, '회원', sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT usr.usrNum, usrId, usrPwd, usrName, auth FROM tbluser usr LEFT OUTER JOIN userAuth auth on usr.usrNum = auth.usrNum WHERE usr.usrId = #{usrId}
SELECT usrId FROM tbluser where usrId = #{usrId}
SELECT usrId FROM tbluser where usrName = #{usrName} and usrPhone = #{usrPhone}
